Articles.Content:
The time warp seems a bit odd. I can't seem to warp faster than 4x, and that's a bit of a bummer when you're heading out to jool... there are only so many hours in the day.

 

(Otherwise, loving the game!)
You should be able to click some where on your route and choose 'warp here'  or also create a maneuver and choose warp to next maneuver.
